data.name: Sample - Tenable.io - 1.4.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Tenable.io" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Vulnerability Information
workflows.description: Fetch information of the specified vulnerability

resource.severity: {{ ((vars.cvssBaseScore | float | round(0, 'ceil')) if (vars.cvssBaseScore | float < 1.0) else (vars.cvssBaseScore | float | round(0, 'floor'))) | resolveRange(vars.vulnSeverityMapping)}}

routes.name: Get Vulnerability Information -> Update Vulnerability Details

workflows.name: Get Asset Export Status
workflows.description: Returns the status of a asset export job from Tenable.io.

workflows.name: Tenable.io > Ingest
workflows.description: Generate scan records for scans fetched from Tenable.io for specified time duration.

steps.name: Create or Update Asset Record for Scan
Create or Update Vulnerabilities Records of Asset

routes.name: Fetch Scan Data -> Create or Update Asset Record for Scan
Create or Update Vulnerabilities Records of Asset -> Mark Scan Ingestion Completed
Create or Update Asset Record for Scan -> Create or Update Vulnerabilities Records of Asset

workflows.name: Cancel Vulnerability Export Job
workflows.description: Cancels the specified vulnerability export job.

workflows.name: Download Asset Export Chunk
workflows.description: Downloads exported assets chunk by ID from Tenable.io

workflows.name: > Tenable.io > Create or Update Asset Records for Scan
workflows.description: Fetch assets and generates or updates asset records for specified scan from Tenable.io

resource.name: {% if vars.item.fqdn %}{{vars.item.fqdn | replace("[", "") | replace("]","") | replace("\"","") }}{% else %}{{vars.item.ip  | replace("[", "") | replace("]","") | replace("'","") }}{% endif %}
{% if vars.item.fqdn %}{{vars.item.fqdn | replace("[", "") | replace("]","") | replace("\"","") }}{% else %}{{vars.item.ip  | replace("[", "") | replace("]","") | replace("'","") }}{% endif %}

steps.name: Fetch Scan Assets
steps.description: Fetches asset details associated with scan.

routes.name: Use Bulk Ingest -> Create Asset Records
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Enable Bulk Ingest -> Create Asset Records
routes.label: No

routes.name: Create New Scan -> Fetch Scan Assets
Find Asset Records Created -> Update Scan Record
Fetch Scan Assets -> Use Bulk Ingest

workflows.name: List Vulnerability Export Jobs
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of vulnerability export jobs. This list includes the 1,000 most recent export jobs regardless of status. However, this list includes completed jobs only if the job completed in the previous three days.

workflows.name: Get Vulnerability Export Status
workflows.description: Returns the status of a vulnerability export job.

workflows.name: Export Assets
workflows.description: Export all assets from the Tenable.io server based on the filter criteria such as chunk size and last assessed time you have specified.

routes.name: Submit Asset Export Job -> Get Asset Export Job Status
Get Asset Export Job Status -> Download Chunks

workflows.name: Get Plugin Information
workflows.description: Retrieves information about a specific plugin from the Tenable.io server, based on the plugin ID you have specified

workflows.name: List Scan's Assets
workflows.description: Retrieves information about asset(s) that are associated with a particular scan from the Tenable.io server, based on the scan ID you have specified.

workflows.name: List Scans
workflows.description: Retrieves a list along with the details of all the completed scans from the Tenable.io server, based on the time duration, such as 24 hours or last 3 days, you have specified.

workflows.name: List Asset Export Jobs
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of asset export jobs. This list includes the 1,000 most recent export jobs regardless of status.

workflows.name: > Tenable.io > Fetch Scans Details
workflows.description: Fetches completed scans' details for the specified duration

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Completion Time",
    "type": "select",
    "name": "days",
    "options": [
      "Last 24 Hours",
      "Last 3 Days",
      "Last 5 Days",
      "Last 7 Days",
      "Last 15 Days",
      "Last 25 Days",
      "Last 30 Days",
      "Last 50 Days",
      "Last 60 Days",
      "Last 90 Days",
      "Last 120 Days",
      "Last 180 Days"
    ],
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "tooltip": "Time duration for which you want to retrieve a list along with details of all the completed scans from Tenable.io. For example, if you choose Last 24 Hours, then the details of all the scans that were completed in the last 24 hours will be retrieved from the Tenable.io server.",
    "value": "Last 3 Days"
  },
  {
    "title": "Enable Bulk Ingest",
    "name": "enableBulkIngest",
    "type": "checkbox",
    "tooltip": "Select this option to enable bulk ingest.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": false
  }
]

workflows.name: Export Vulnerabilties
workflows.description: Exports all vulnerabilities from the Tenable.io server based on the filter criteria such as chunk size, severity, etc. you have specified.

routes.name: Submit Vulnerability Export Job -> Get Vulnerability Export Status
Get Vulnerability Export Status -> Download Vulnerability Export Chunk

workflows.name: Submit Vulnerability Export Job
workflows.description: Submits vulnerability export job that match the request criteria.

workflows.name: List Asset's Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: Retrieves information about vulnerabilities that are associated with a particular asset from the Tenable.io server, based on the asset UUID you have specified.

workflows.name: Trigger Scan
workflows.description: Triggers a scan on the Tenable.io server based on the scan ID you have specified.

workflows.name: > Tenable.io > Create or Update Vulnerabilities Records for Asset
workflows.description: Fetch and create or update vulnerabilities records for specified asset

arguments.assetRisk: {% set _cvss_score = vars.maxCvssScore %}{{ (((_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'ceil')) if (_cvss_score | float < 1.0) else (_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'floor'))) | resolveRange(vars.vulnSeverityMapping)).itemValue}}

resource.name: {{vars.item.info['plugin_details']['name']}}
resource.severity: {% set _cvss_score = vars.item.info['risk_information']['cvss_base_score'] %}{{ ((_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'ceil')) if (_cvss_score | float < 1.0) else (_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'floor'))) | resolveRange(vars.vulnSeverityMapping)}}

resource.name: {{vars.item.info['plugin_details']['name']}}
resource.severity: {% set _cvss_score = vars.item.info['risk_information']['cvss_base_score'] %}{{ ((_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'ceil')) if (_cvss_score | float < 1.0) else (_cvss_score | float | round(0, 'floor'))) | resolveRange(vars.vulnSeverityMapping)}}

routes.name: Link Vulnerabilities to Asset -> Calculate Asset Risk
Create Vulnerability Records -> Calculate Asset Risk
Calculate Asset Risk -> Update Asset Risk
Fetch Asset Vulnerabilities -> Fetch Vulnerability Details
Fetch Vulnerability Details -> Enable Bulk Ingest Records
Enable Bulk Ingest Records -> Create Vulnerability Records
routes.label: No

routes.name: Get Created Vulnerability IRIs -> Link Vulnerabilities to Asset
Enable Bulk Ingest Records -> Create Vulnerability Records
routes.label: Yes

workflows.name: Submit Asset Export Job
workflows.description: Submits asset export job that match the request criteria from Tenable.io.

workflows.name: Cancel Asset Export Job
workflows.description: Cancels the specified asset export job.

workflows.name: Download Vulnerability Export Chunk
workflows.description: Downloads exported vulnerabilities as a JSON file from Tenable.io

workflows.name: Get Host Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the details for the specified host based on the scan UUID and host ID provided.

workflows.name: Get Scan History
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of objects, each of which represent an individual run of the specified scan based on the scan ID provided
